fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Tempt the fate of three player each night.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- One player out of the group of three players that you chose will be dealt the Attack value that you choose.
- You have three uses of your ability - one with Basic Attack, one with Powerful Attack, and one with Unstoppable Attack.
- You may not tempt your own fate you nincompoop.
